mapper.select: SELECT c.*, u.USERCOUPONID as userCouponId, u.USERID as userId, u.ISSUEDDATE as issuedDate, u.USEDDATE as usedDate, u.PRODUCTNO as productNo, u.STATUS as status, u.CREATEDAT as createdAt, u.UPDATEDAT as updatedAt, u.EVENTPARTICIPATED as eventParticipated FROM COUPON c LEFT JOIN USERCOUPON u ON c.COUPONID = u.COUPONID AND u.USERID = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM BTCPREDICT WHERE PREDICTDATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 AND RESULT IS NULL
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO USERCOUPON u USING (SELECT #{userNo} as USERID, #{couponId} as COUPONID FROM DUAL) src ON (u.USERID = src.USERID AND u.COUPONID = src.COUPONID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET EVENTPARTICIPATED = 'Y' WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USERCOUPONID, USERID, COUPONID, EVENTPARTICIPATED) VALUES (SEQUSERCOUPON.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{couponId}, 'Y')

INSERT INTO BTCPREDICT ( USERNO, PREDICTDATE, PREDICT, CREATEDAT ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, TRUNC(CAST(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS DATE)), #{prediction}, CAST(SYSTIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul' AS DATE) )
